error.title: Error
error.doExport: [ if you want to report a problem, please include exported file ]
error.reachUs: The viewer has run into an unexpected error. Please contact us and provide the error details.
error.pluginImportFail: Plugin {{plugin}} failed to load data. Please, let us know about this issue and provide exported file.
error.cacheImportFail: Plugin {{plugin}} failed to load cached data. Please, let us know about this issue and provide exported file.
error.nothingToRenderDetails: The active session does not specify any image or layers for opening. Is your link valid?
error.renderDesc: Your browser did not pass a rendering test: the visual output might not work as intended.

slide.404: The data you are trying to open does not exist!
slide.401: Your login session has expired: please refresh the window to log in.
slide.403: You do not have necessary permission to access this data!
slide.pending: The loading seems to be stuck: an image server might be unresponsive.

cache.name: Params set from cache (name). Reset.
cache.order: Params set from cache (layer position). Reset.

messages.invalidPostData: The request has no setup data. See POST data:
messages.postDataSyntaxErr: The visualization setup is not parse-able.
messages.cookiesDisabled: An attempt to load data through cookies failed. Cookies are disabled. You can enable them in Settings.
messages.bgReferenceMissing: JSON parametrization of the visualizer requires valid dataReference for each background layer.
messages.shaderTypeMissing: You must specify type parameter for each visualization layer.
messages.pluginRemoved:
This plugin has been automatically
removed: there was an error.
messages.pluginRemovedNamed: Plugin {{plugin}} has been removed: there was an error.
messages.pluginLoadFailedNamed: Plugin {{plugin}} could not be loaded: please, contact administrator.
messages.visualizationDisabled: Failed to load overlays (Visualization {{name}}) - it has been disabled.
messages.overlaysLoadFail: Failed to load overlays - only the tissue will be visible.
messages.pluginsWelcome: It looks like this is your first time here
messages.pluginsWelcomeDescription: Please, go through {{tutorial}} tutorial to familiarize yourself with the environment.
messages.urlCopied: The URL was copied to your clipboard.
messages.warnPageReload: It seems you've made some work already. It might be wise to export your setup first. Reload now.
messages.modalWindowBlocked: An application modal window '{{title}}' was blocked by your browser. Click here to open.
messages.swapImagesFail: Could not load the selected image!
messages.stillLoadingSwap: Another image is still being loaded - please wait.

php.transitiveInvalidDeps: Dependency in {{context}}: {{dependency}} but {{transitive}} has an error.
php.removedInvalidDeps: Removed due to invalid dependency, one of: {{dependencies}}
php.pluginInvalidDeps: Failure: plugin relies on dependencies with errors. {{error}}

menu.title: Select a tutorial
menu.description: The visualization is still under development: components and features are changing. The tutorials might not work, missing or be outdated.

basic.title: Basic Functionality
basic.1:
You can navigate in the content either using mouse,
or via keyboard: arrow keys (movement) and +/- (zoom). Try it out now.
basic.2:
On the right, the Main Panel
holds most functionality and also allows
to interact with plugins.
basic.3:
An interactive navigator can be used
for orientation or to jump quickly on different areas.
basic.4:
The whole visualization consists of two layers:
the background canvas and the data layer above.
basic.4a:
For now, there is only background image visible.
You can toggle its visibility here.
basic.5:
You can toggle background visibility
and control the data layer opacity.
The button on the right clones the viewer and synchronizes the navigation.
basic.6:
The viewer supports multiple backgrounds
you can switch between in the Tools Menu.
basic.7: There are several background images available. Click to open.
basic.8: You can turn them on/off or blend using an opacity slider.
basic.9:
The data layer
-the core visualization functionality-
is highly flexible and can be controlled here.
basic.10:
Click to set
this controls subpanel to be always visible.
basic.11:
In case multiple different visualizations
are set, you can select
which one is being displayed.
basic.12:
Each visualization consists of several
data parts and their interpretation.
Here, you can control each part separately,
and also drag-n-drop to reorder.
basic.13:
Your settings can be saved here.
This feature works only with enabled cookies.
Saved adjustments are applied on layers of the same name.
basic.14:
Your setup can be shared:

with a link: shares the session without data

with a HTML file: shares the workspace as-is
basic.15:
That's all for now.
For more functionality, see Plugins menu.
With attached plugins, more tutorials will appear here.

plugins.title: Plugins
plugins.noPluginsAvailable: It seems there are no plugins
plugins.noPluginsDetails: Ask the system maintainer for more features
